img_text: The Telegraph@ @Telegraph Follow Twitter to remove 'like' tool in a bid to improve the quality of debatee Twitter to remove 'like' tool in a bid to improve the quality of debate Twitter is planning to remove the ability to "like" tweets in a radical move that aims to improve the quality of debate on the social network. telegraph.co.uk 3:50 AM -29 Oct 2018 é 203 Retweets 208 Likes
